casebody.data:
PEOPLE State of Illinois, respondent,
v.
Lamarr MAXEY, petitioner. No. 121137 Supreme Court of Illinois. November 22, 2017

Petition for Leave to Appeal Denied.

In the exercise of this Court's supervisory authority, the Appellate Court, First District, is directed to vacate its judgment in People v. Maxey, case No. 1-13-0698 (06/30/16). The appellate court is directed to consider the effect of this Court's opinion in People v. Wright, 2017 IL 119561, on the issue of whether defendant's waiver of counsel was invalid based on the Rule 401 (a) admonishments, and determine if a different result is warranted.
